title: Prayer of Gratitude for God's Protection
content:
Heavenly Father,

Like Noah and his family, we thank You for Your loving protection. You watched over them in the ark during the great storm, and You watch over us every day.

Thank You for keeping us safe from harm. Thank You for providing for our needs, just as You provided food and shelter for Noah's family and all the animals.

Help us to trust in Your protection when we face difficult times. Remind us that You are always with us, just as You were with Noah.

We praise You for Your constant care and love.

In Jesus' name, Amen.
